Notifications.NoImagePath: No image path found. Please set a token image first.
Notifications.CachedImageWarning: The image path is from Token Framer's cache. There is no need to refresh at this time.

DebugMode.Name: Debug Mode
DebugMode.Hint: Enable debug logging to the console for troubleshooting.

CacheFolder.Name: Cache Folder
CacheFolder.Hint: Folder path for cached frame images. Leave empty for default (worlds/[world-id]/token-framer-cache).

CacheResolution.Name: Cache Image Resolution
CacheResolution.Hint: Size of cached frame images in pixels. Value is used for both width and height (e.g., 1000 = 1000x1000).

CacheQuality.Name: Cache Image Quality
CacheQuality.Hint: WebP quality for cached images (0.5 = 50%, 1.0 = 100%). Higher quality means larger file sizes.

DefaultMaskRadius.Name: Default Mask Radius
DefaultMaskRadius.Hint: Default radius for auto-generated circular masks (0.5 to 1.0).

DefaultBaseScale.Name: Default Base Scale
DefaultBaseScale.Hint: Default scale for the base token image when a frame is applied (0.5 to 1.0).

Config.Title: Token Frame
Config.EnableHint: Apply a frame overlay to this token.
Config.FrameImageHint: Path to the frame overlay image (PNG, WEBP recommended).
Config.MaskImageHint: Custom mask image. White areas are visible. Leave empty for circular mask.
Config.BaseScaleHint: Scale factor for the base token image (shrinks to fit inside frame).
Config.BaseOffsetHint: Pixel offset for the base image position (X and Y).
Config.MaskRadiusHint: Radius of the circular mask (when no custom mask image is set).
Config.MaskScaleHint: Scale factor for custom mask image.
Config.MaskOffsetHint: Pixel offset for the mask position (X and Y).
Config.FrameScaleHint: Scale factor for the frame overlay image.
Config.FrameOffsetHint: Pixel offset for the frame position (X and Y).
